instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-02016 no power on
threads.message:
Hello guys this is a 820-02016 in 5.13v 0.04amps on both usb ports 
No power on from battery
No enter on DFU MODE

ppbus_AON = 12.25v
pp3v8_AON_VDDMAIN =3.75V
PP5V2_S2= 0V
PP3V3_S2=0V
PP1V25_S2=0V
Diode mode
PP5V2_S2= 0.209v
PP3V3_S2=0.447v
PP1V25_S2=0.228v

How can start

threads.title: 820-02016 no power on
threads.message:
Check U7700/8100 all VLDOs; pages 29 & 34.

One PMIC may be bad.
Check diode mode to ground on all their coils.

threads.title: 820-02016 no power on
threads.message: Thanks to your advice while checking u7700 VLDO I found a short in pp5v_BSTLQ_VOUT_MPMU and when solving this the machine is alive!!
